remarks: A sufficient condition (first conjunct pair, that holds when ` T ` is a positive operator) for an eigenvalue ` B ` (second conjunct pair) to be nonnegative.  Remark (ii) in [Hughes] p. 137.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jul-2005.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
eigpos.1 $e |- A e. ~H $.
eigpos.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
eigposi $p |- ( ( ( ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) e. RR /\ 0 <_ ( A .ih ( T ` A ) ) ) /\ ( ( T ` A ) = ( B .h A ) /\ A =/= 0h ) ) -> ( B e. RR /\ 0 <_ B ) ) $.
